pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Indulgent Body Wash 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Indulgent Body Wash contains pure Coconut Oil and Monoi, to hydrate and indulgently pamper your skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with water.

Common Uses

Paraben, Sulfate and Phthalate Free. Contains plant derived ingredients.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Acrylates Crosspolymer-4, Propylene Glycol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Stearate, Cocamide MEA, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tocopheryl, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, PEG-150 Distearate, Ethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Sorbic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium EDTA, Coumarin.

Directions

For best results, apply a small amount onto a cleansing pouf or washcloth, gently massage onto the body in the shower, and then rinse. To help keep skin moisturised throughout the day, follow with your favourite Palmer's body lotion.
